short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce Admin and Dev Assistant who help to Quick Find,Login,Query,Backup,View LWC Code,Cron Expression,Record Edit-View,Exports

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üíª Features : 
‚úî Works with both Salesforce Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic UI.
‚úî Quick Login as your  Salesforce Users.
‚úî Quick Source Code Backup with Lightning Components.
‚úî Quick View Source Code of Aura and Lightning Web Components.
‚úî Quick view/edit all fields of any record anywhere.
‚úî Quick SOQL / SOSL query and view records of any object and can also export more than One Million records.
‚úî You can quickly find out on which page and layout your lightning components are placed. (excluded community)
‚úî One can see the field API name of any object on the layout.
‚úî Can export Org Describe as a CSV.
‚úî Cron Expression generator and converter.
‚úî Checkbox on field level security (FLS) to select all fields.
‚úî JSON 2 Apex model (wrapper) class converter.
‚úî JSON, XML beautifier and validator.
‚úî One-click login URL generator.
‚úî Can change from 15 to 18 digit ID.
‚úî Easily give Field Level Security (FLS) permissions on an object on more than one profile at the same time.
‚úî Easily give Object Level Security permissions on an object on more than one profile and permission set at the same time.
‚úî Quickly find the setup menu anywhere, shortcut key (Ctrl + Shift + Space).
‚úî Easily get the apex classes row structure code in Developer Console.

üìù Notes:
* If installed for the first time, refresh the page before using.
* More coming soon...
